data.question: What is the overall yield of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(phosphonic acid) synthesized?
What method was used to record the IR spectra mentioned in the synthesis process?
data.answer: KBr pellets on a Nicolet Magna-560 FT-IR spectrometer

data.question: Is the PXRD data for compound 1b before and after the removal of guest molecules identical?
What is the purpose of adding conc. HCl in the synthesis of [Nd2(L-H)2(MeOH)8]·(L-H4)·(HCl)3·(H2O)6, 1a?
data.answer: To re-dissolve the precipitate that formed immediately upon mixing the reactants.

data.question: What temperature was the TGA experiments carried out?
data.answer: At a heating rate of 4 °C/min in air.

data.question: Does the synthesis of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(phosphonic acid) involve a Pd-catalyzed phosphonation reaction?
What is the crystal structure of compound 1a?
data.answer: A 2-D lamellar structure consisting of eight-coordinate Nd centers and monoprotonated L-H bridging groups.

data.question: What is the role of chiral crown ether groups in compound 1a?
data.answer: To enantioselectively interact with organic cations such as protonated amino acids for bulk chiral separations.

data.question: Are the CD spectra of 1a and 1b made from R- and S-L-H4 mirror images of each other?
What is the dihedral angle between the naphthyl rings in the free L-H4 ligand?
Was the synthesis of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(phosphonic acid) started from 6,6'-dibromo-2,2'-dihydroxy-1,1'-binaphthalene?
What is the significance of the PXRD studies for compounds 1a and 1b?
data.answer: To demonstrate the retention of framework structures of 1a and 1b after the removal of guest molecules.

data.question: What is the yield of the synthesis of [Sm2(L-H)2(MeOH)8]·(L-H4)·(HCl)3·(H2O)6, 1b?
Is the lamellar structure of 1a entirely different from that of another family of lanthanide phosphonates reported recently?
What is the purpose of using conc. HCl in the synthesis of compound 1b?
data.answer: To re-dissolve the precipitate that formed immediately upon mixing the reactants.

data.question: Does the synthesis of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(phosphonic acid) involve a cyclization reaction?
What is the role of pentaethylene glycol ditosylate in the synthesis of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(diethylphosphonate)?
data.answer: It is used in the cyclization reaction to afford 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(diethylphosphonate).

data.question: What is the space group of compound 1a?
Is the synthesis of 2,2'-pentaethylene glycol-1,1'-binaphthyl-6,6'-bis(phosphonic acid) completed in five steps?
What is the significance of the dihedral angle between the naphthyl rings in the coordinating L-H ligand?
data.answer: It affects the geometry and potentially the functionality of the resulting compound.
